extShortDesc.message: Be notified of streams from Dailymotion, Hitbox, Twitch and Bream.
extShortDesc.description: this will be used as short description in web stores: MUST BE 132 characters OR LESS

wasnt_configured_but_not_detected_as_cha.message: wasn't configured, but not detected as channel.

wasnt_configured_and_have_been_added.message: wasn't configured, and have been added.

wasnt_configured_and_can_be_added.message: wasn't configured, and can be added.

No_supported_stream_detected_in_the_curr.message: No supported stream detected in the current tab, so, nothing to add.

delete_tooltip.message: To delete a stream from the settings, move it in the trash can.

will_be_deleted_are_you_sure.message: will be deleted, are you sure?

Livestreamer_command_copied_into_the_cli.message: Livestreamer command copied into the clipboard

dailymotion_keys_list_description.message: Stream list in a comma separated list.

hitbox_keys_list_description.message: Stream list in a comma separated list.

hitbox_user_id_description.message: Enter your Hitbox id to be able to import the stream(s) you follow

twitch_keys_list_description.message: Stream list in a comma separated list.

twitch_user_id_description.message: Enter your Twitch id to be able to import the stream(s) you follow

beam_keys_list_description.message: Stream list in a comma separated list.

notify_online_title.message: Show a notification when a stream start

notify_offline_title.message: Show a notification when a stream finish

show_offline_in_panel_title.message: Show offline streams in the panel

confirm_addStreamFromPanel_description.message: Show a notification to confirm when adding a stream of config (from panel)

confirm_deleteStreamFromPanel_descriptio.message: Show a notification to confirm when deleting a stream of config (from panel)

panel_theme_description.message: Choose the theme of the panel

background_color_description.message: Choose base color of the panel

livestreamer_cmd_to_clipboard_title.message: Copy Livestreamer command on stream click

livestreamer_cmd_to_clipboard_descriptio.message: Check to activate copying Livestreamer command in clipboard when clicking on an online stream
